cause.description:
The End Malaria Blue Ribbon Campaign is rallying people globally in the fight to End Malaria. This universal symbol can foster partnerships and collaborations unifying us in the global fight against malaria.
"The Blue Ribbon will remain a longstanding symbol to keep raising attention and bringing a great number of people and resources behind this cause, and with much needed team spirit." - Dr. Mary Galinski, MFI
1. End Malaria
2. We must find solutions to health, economic and social problems caused by malaria.
cause.mission: To spread this universal symbol signifying the global fight to End Malaria
cause.name: End Malaria Blue Ribbon Campaign
